Text:
I guess I really should of given some instructions. I have come to learn that stuff as easy as this can get messed up.

Just run PZ-Crack.exe, it does everything for you, and all versions of Project Zomboid will be playable for you, until they change the way verification is done.
Thanks for the up! This morning I uploaded a customizable inventory cheat script torrent, you might like it too...
